panels.visual: Party gathering, battered but triumphant Looking up at aligned Orrery
panels.dialogue: Prismor: "The Orrery... it's beautiful." Pocky: "The lenses are aligned, but... not like before."

panels.visual: Close on Orrery Showing Displacement essence dominant Celestial and Nature secondary Mechanistic and Harmony minimal **Caption:** "The lenses pulse with new alignment: DISPLACEMENT - CELESTIAL - NATURE - mechanistic - harmony"
Party emerging from sanctum Dawn breaking over mountains Winter Festival continuing above **Caption:** "Dawn breaks over Everpeak. The Winter Festival continues, unaware of how close disaster came."
Barth meeting them at forge Noticing forge working smoothly again
panels.dialogue: Barth: "The mechanistic essence... it's diminished, but stable. I can work with this."
